channel.title: About Docs on
channel.description: Recent content in About Docs on

item.title: Quickstart
item.description: Creating a new folder or page # All contents are located in ./content/en/docs/. Static contents are located in ./static/. Please follow the format of existing directory and file structures to create new content. For advanced instructions, please refer to the Doks website.

item.title: Key Modifications
item.description: Basic Modifications # Basic modifications are made according to the Doks tutorial. Theme Modifications # Theme modifications are located in ./layouts/ and ./static/css. Functional Modifcations # In ./partials/header/header.html, hard-coded hrefs to direct to the project subdomain /devdocs to support Github project pages. On local testing, clicking Centralis and Get Started will lead to 404. In ./layouts/index.html, modified layout and hrefs. In ./markdownlint-cli2.jsonc, set MD009/no-trailing-spaces = false to allow for looser markdown formatting.
